sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { collecting, letGet } from "./Bridge"; export const Athlets=()=>{ const{position}=useParams() const [tournament,setTournament]=useState({ "tournamentId":0, "name":"", "startDate":"", "venue":"", "price":0, "participants":[] }) useEffect(()=>{ gather() },[]) const gather=async()=>{ const t = await collecting() setTournament(t.data[position]) } return( <>

{tournament.name}

{every.map((obj,index)=>( ))}
Tournament IdTournament Name Tournament Start Date Tournament Venue Tournament Participants Tournament Winner Tournament Prize Money Actions
{obj.tournamentId} {obj.name} {new Date(obj.startDate).toISOString()} {obj.venue} {obj.participants.length} {obj.winner} {obj.price}
); }
